django.contrib.gis.shortcuts
============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.shortcuts


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.shortcuts.numpy


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.shortcuts.compress_kml
   django.contrib.gis.shortcuts.render_to_kml
   django.contrib.gis.shortcuts.render_to_kmz


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: numpy
   :value: False


.. py:function:: compress_kml(kml)

   Return compressed KMZ from the given KML string.


.. py:function:: render_to_kml(*args, **kwargs)

   Render the response as KML (using the correct MIME type).


.. py:function:: render_to_kmz(*args, **kwargs)

   Compress the KML content and return as KMZ (using the correct
   MIME type).
